encryptnotes.title: Encrypt Notes App
encryptnotes.description: This is a fullstack application designed for encrypting short notes.

features.title: Responsive design
features.description: The app is designed to be responsive and work on all devices.

features.title: Fullstack application
features.description: The app is built with React.js, Node.js and PostgreSQL. You can access the backend here.

features.title: Performance
features.description: The project is lightweight and simple, avoiding heavy libraries to ensure fast performance.

features.title: Clear Modular Architecture
features.description: The application is flexible for modifications and scaling, making development and maintenance more efficient.

welle.title: 3. Welle - Berlin Coffee Shop Finder
welle.description: Fullstack app for discovering specialty coffee shops in Berlin with reviews and ratings.

features.title: Modern Full-Stack Application
features.description: Built with React, Node.js, MongoDB and GraphQL for efficient data handling.

features.title: Interactive Guide to Berlin's Specialty Cafés
features.description: Explore specialty cafés displayed on an interactive map, with detailed café pages.

features.title: Community Reviews and Ratings
features.description: Users can submit reviews and rate cafés to help others discover great places.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Fully responsive design ensures optimal experience across devices.

features.title: Architecture
features.description: The application on frontend follows the "Feature-Sliced Design" methodology. For more information on Feature-Sliced Design, visit feature-sliced.design.

features.title: User Authentication and Profile Management
features.description: Supports Google and email authentication with profile management features.

bvg.title: Berlin Public Transport App
bvg.description: Web app for viewing real-time public transport arrival times in Berlin and Brandenburg.

features.title: Real-Time Departure Schedule
features.description: Displays upcoming departure schedules for selected stops in Berlin and Brandenburg.

features.title: Advanced Filtering and Favorites
features.description: Users can filter results and save favorite stops for quick access.

features.title: Architecture
features.description: The application on frontend follows the "Feature-Sliced Design" methodology. For more information on Feature-Sliced Design, visit feature-sliced.design.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Ensures an optimal user experience across different screen sizes.

eisenhower.title: Eisenhower Matrix
eisenhower.description: Web app for organizing tasks based on the Eisenhower Matrix principle.

features.title: Task Organization
features.description: Organize tasks based on the urgency and importance of each task.

features.title: Drag-and-Drop Interface
features.description: Intuitive drag-and-drop interface for easy task management.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Ensures an optimal user experience across different screen sizes.

features.title: Data Storage
features.description: Provides the ability to store data both on the device and in the cloud.
